sub_title: Communication and Change Management Officer at European Medicines Agency
summary: Carrying over more than 18 years of work experience in event planning, project management and stakeholder communication. Working in an international environment since 2012 with experience in communication with a variety of stakeholders, adjusting the style and purpose of the message to different audiences. Experienced in general administration, communication, change management, brand management, sponsorship programs, concept planning, business planning and implementation. Proven ability to balance priorities, meet tight deadlines and deliver exceptional results through project management. Known for thriving in dynamic and high-pressure environments, resilient to pressure, unexpected changes and work overload. Portuguese native speaker with full professional proficiency of English and Swedish. Limited working proficiency in Dutch and Spanish.
